name: Auragi
additional_notices: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Auragi Finance is an automatic market maker with ve(3,3) mechanics, based on Velodrome. We offer our users minimal slippage, low swapping fees and deep liquidity. And, our swapping fees are 0.01% for stable and 0.05% for volatile pairs.

What makes your project unique?
We are a better version of Velodrome and we have 20k holders with a very engaging community.
proof: https://arbiscan.io/token/0xFF191514A9baba76BfD19e3943a4d37E8ec9a111

History of your project.
We were builders in Web 2.0 and we solely build in Web 3.0 on Ethereum layer-2. We aim to offer our users the best defi experience on Arbitrum and we focus on delivering results to our long-term holders. Like many defi teams, we choose to stay anon while staying transparent with everything related to this project. 

What’s next for your project?
After polishing our product, we'll make a multichain version to ZkSync.

What can your token be used for?
Auragi Finance uses two tokens to manage its utility and governance:
$AGI with over 20,000 holders as ERC-20 utility token
$veAGI with over 1,500 holders as ERC-721 governance token
Users can receive $veAGI by vesting their $AGI tokens at any time.
$veAGI holders vote for the Liquidity which they like, and earn passive income by getting 100% trading fees, 100% bribes and rebase rewards.

description.cs:
What is the project about?
Auragi Finance is an automatic market maker with ve(3,3) mechanics, based on Velodrome. We offer our users minimal slippage, low swapping fees and deep liquidity. And, our swapping fees are 0.01% for stable and 0.05% for volatile pairs.

What makes your project unique?
We are a better version of Velodrome and we have 20k holders with a very engaging community.
proof: https://arbiscan.io/token/0xFF191514A9baba76BfD19e3943a4d37E8ec9a111

History of your project.
We were builders in Web 2.0 and we solely build in Web 3.0 on Ethereum layer-2. We aim to offer our users the best defi experience on Arbitrum and we focus on delivering results to our long-term holders. Like many defi teams, we choose to stay anon while staying transparent with everything related to this project. 

What’s next for your project?
After polishing our product, we'll make a multichain version to ZkSync.

What can your token be used for?
Auragi Finance uses two tokens to manage its utility and governance:
$AGI with over 20,000 holders as ERC-20 utility token
$veAGI with over 1,500 holders as ERC-721 governance token
Users can receive $veAGI by vesting their $AGI tokens at any time.
$veAGI holders vote for the Liquidity which they like, and earn passive income by getting 100% trading fees, 100% bribes and rebase rewards.
